name: Easy Red Thai Curry with Chicken and Broccoli
author: Eli
summary: This easy Thai curry with chicken and broccoli takes very little time and is nice and spicy. You can of course adjust the amount of curry paste to your liking.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into strips
1 ½ teaspoons Thai red curry paste
1 head broccoli, florets separated and stems chopped
directions: Heat oil in a deep skillet over medium-high heat and saute chicken until browned, 2 to 3 minutes
Add garlic and curry paste and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes
Pour in coconut milk and season with sugar and salt
Add broccoli, cover, and simmer until broccoli is soft, about 7 minutes
